originalText.text: I recommend Adam highly! He is a superb teacher who can tailor lessons to whatever level of depth you want. I wanted to learn how to play the piano, but also to get a taste of theory. He has more than satisfied both needs. I marvel at his patience, his respect for me, his gentle humor, and his ability to encourage me with a variety of techniques. The age range of his students is quite amazing. I am an adult learn  who feels very fortunate to have this gifted teacher.

originalText.text: Adam is an awesome drum teacher. My son has been taking from him for several years. They started in North Carolina and now he does the lessons remotely via FaceTime. Adam is great with young people and he is an exceptional teacher. He has taught my son from square one and now he is playing lots of complex songs. My son absolutely loves Adam and has developed a great passion for the drums. I highly recommend him.

text.text: Adam is an awesome drum teacher. My son has been taking from him for several years. They started in North Carolina and now he does the lessons remotely via FaceTime. Adam is great with young people and he is an exceptional teacher. He has taught my son from square one and now he is playing lots of complex songs. My son absolutely loves Adam and has developed a great passion for the drums. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: I have taken lessons with Adam for about a year and a half and could not have found a better teacher. He centers his lessons and focus around the type of music that interests students, while still reinforcing the necessary basics along the way. Throughout the time I spent taking lessons, my drumming skills (and music skills in general) have improved tremendously. Adam has always been flexible, understanding and patient. I could not think higher of him as a drum instructor and would recommend him to anyone- young or old- looking to learn to play the drums.

He centers his lessons and focus around the type of music that interests students, while still reinforcing the necessary basics along the way. I could not think higher of him as a drum instructor and would recommend him to anyone- young or old- looking to learn to play the drums.

originalText.text: Adam is a versatile drum instructor who has incredible patience and ability to transfer his talent to his students. My 8 year old daughter has followed him from in-person instructional lessons in NC to now receiving lessons via video sessions from a distance with him in NYC. We could have found another instructor locally, but Adam’s ability to connect musically with a student is something we couldn’t replace easily. He communicates well regarding  our daughter’s progression and next steps with her passion for the drums.

originalText.text:
Adam is an amazing drum teacher. My son started taking lessons from him while he was still in NC. When Adam decided to move to NY my son insisted to continue taking lessons from Adam online. My son was not interested in taking lessons from anyone else.

Adam is patient and consistant. Best of all he knows what he's doing. You are definitely in good hands to learn the basics and skills of playing the drums with Adam as your teacher.
